name: Fitness & Health Notion Template
description: Keep track of your workouts and meals from a single dashboard. The template provides you with all of the information you require in clean and simple cards. The calorie calculator will show you how many calories you need to lose based on your weight and age. This will allow you to make appropriate dietary changes.The icons are chosen in such a way that they look good even in dark mode.What's Inside?Calorie CalculatorWeekly Workout TrackerWeekly Meal PlannerExercise LogHow to use this?After the pu
features: Calorie Calculator; Weekly Workout Tracker; Weekly Meal Planner; Exercise Log; After the purchase, you will be redirected toNotion.; Click on theDuplicatebutton in the top right corner. (This will duplicate the template to your workspace); Hooray!! You can start planning your workout and meals!; If you have any feedback on how we can improve this template, feel free to contact me atbazaswaliha@gmail.com.
